review: very large data usage  Keep it un-plug until you want to use it.
author: Michael  Callahan

review: Everything I needed!!!  Very Easy to install.  Love it!
author: Sherri Blackwell

review: very easy to use and set up is easy
author: bobby johnson jr

review: This has not been worth the $40 it cost. Very little free content even with prime and hard to filter out all the items that cost money. Also many episodes are in SD which is not great to watch. I don't use it to access other streaming video services so I can't comment on that. If I could give it back I certainly would.
author: jefflemay

review: Worked great for two weeks now shuts off and on and sometimes locks up in pause mode. Any tech support out there.? Can't find any. Tried 're setting by unplugging, no help. Am I going to have to send it back?.
author: M. Thompson

review: Maybe not as good/ fast as there big fire tv box, but still way better than the compititions
author: Andrew

review: No.  I was watching a program and the screen appears to have locked.  Using the selections on the hand control is not helpful.  Several attempts to move on but can't get past the picture that is frozen on the TV screen ..... Help please.
author: g young
